list user * * -//...
read user alice * //test-perms/...
=read user alice * -//test-perms/Security/...
list group Everyone * -//...
=read group DocSiteDenyPath * -//dax-docsite/cmd/docsite/build.go
write group DocSiteWritePath * //dax-docsite/cmd/docsite/build.go
list group TestGroup * -//mike-test/...
write group TestGroup * //mike-test/branches/cygnus/boehm-gc/...
